r.s: OO-Interface to modify HTTP-Headers easily, including some classes that handle common subjects (like Caching, etc.).
r.d: This class provides methods to set/modify HTTP-Headers. To abstract common things, like caching etc. some sub classes are provided that handle special cases (i.e. HTTP_Header_Cache).
r.n: * redirect sends session id by default when trans_sid=1, behaviour has changed!
